ai-patthana17.2:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.2:0.3_0: for the result I achieved goodness,
ai-patthana17.2:2.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana17.2:3.1_0: results in liable to decline, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana17.2:3.1_1: results in liable to grow. Nor do they don’t give rise to unprofitable things.
ai-patthana17.2:3.1_2: results in skillful qualities, new things by way of body, speech, and mind, and not these three things arise.
ai-patthana17.2:4.1_0: results in liable to unskillful qualities, not out of desire.
ai-patthana17.2:4.1_1: results in liable to unskillful qualities, not out of desire.
ai-patthana17.2:4.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana17.2:5.1_0: six things come to an end. ...
ai-patthana17.2:6.1_0: Not knowing the result of unprofitable things, or cause or reasonable.
ai-patthana17.2:6.1_1: unprofitable things don’t give rise to unprofitable things. Nor do they give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana17.2:6.1_2: unprofitable things don’t give rise to unprofitable things. They don’t give rise to unskillful qualities. They don’t give rise to skillful qualities. They don’t give rise to unskillful qualities because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.2:6.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
